name: Neural Overclock
description: A single-use injectable that temporarily boosts neural processing speed and reaction time. Used by runners during high-stakes heists or when they need to process information faster than humanly possible.

attributes.effect: Increases damage dealt by 20% while using energy for 15 seconds.

flavor.rationale: In a world of augmented reality interfaces and rapid data streams, the ability to quickly interpret and act on complex information is critical for survival. Neural Overclock provides that edge in moments where every millisecond counts.
